sections.name: King Merlokrep
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

link.name: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 109
link.alt: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 109

link.name: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 109
link.alt: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 109

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

traits.name: Kobold
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the kobold ancestry. Kobolds are reptilian humanoids who are usually Small and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by kobolds.

link.name: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 109
link.alt: Crown of the Kobold King pg. 109

gear.name: oversized red and gold satin cloak with a crude painting of a gold dragon on the back

automatic_abilities.name: Rise from Death

traits.name: Aura
traits.text: An aura is an emanation that continually ebbs out from you, affecting creatures within a certain radius. Aura can also refer to the magical signature of an item or a creature with a strong alignment.

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Necromancy
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.

automatic_abilities.text: If King Merlokrep is slain, the *Crown of the Kobold King* glows brighter with an awful yellow radiance; this light slithers down inside the dead kobold's flesh, emanating from within as his body begins to twitch and writhe. If the Crown is allowed to remain on his head for 3 rounds, King Merlokrep rises from death as an undead Kobold King—this restores him to full hit points and grants him the Undead trait (along with negative healing and susceptibility to positive energy). Once the undead king is defeated, he remains destroyed—the absorbed energy of the Third Seal allows him to Rise from Death only once. If the Crown is removed before 3 rounds pass, the light winks out, and the energy absorbed by the Third Seal dissipates harmlessly.

traits.name: Sweep
traits.text: This weapon makes wide sweeping or spinning attacks, making it easier to attack multiple enemies. When you attack with this weapon, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll if you already attempted to attack a different target this turn using this weapon.

ability.name: Imperious Retreat

traits.name: Manipulate
traits.text: You must physically manipulate an item or make gestures to use an action with this trait. Creatures without a suitable appendage can’t perform actions with this trait. Manipulate actions often trigger reactions.

traits.name: Move
traits.text: An action with this trait involves moving from one space to another.

ability.requirement: King Merlokrep is adjacent to at least one enemy
ability.effect: King Merlokrep whips his fabulous satin cloak into the face of an adjacent creature and attempts an Intimidation check against that creature's Will DC. On a success, the creature is humiliated and distracted by the act and is flat-footed until the end of King Merlokrep's next turn. King Merlokrep then Strides up to his Speed and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. He must end this movement in a space that isn't adjacent to any enemy.

ability.name: Sneak Attack
ability.text: King Merlokrep deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
